001import java.util.Stack;
002
003/**
004 * Décrivez votre classe GameEngine ici.
005 *
006 * @author HOUEE Adrien
007 * @version 22-11-21
008 */
009public class GameEngine
010{
011    /**
012     * Un parser à portée privée
013     */
014    private Parser        aParser;
015    
016    /**
017     * Une room à portée privée
018     */
019    private Room          aCurrentRoom;
020    
021    /**
022     * Une pile de direction à portée privée
023     */
024    private Stack<String> aDirectionHistory;
025    
026    /**
027     * Une interface utilisateur à portée privée
028     */
029    private UserInterface aGui;
030    
031    /**
032     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
033     */
034    public GameEngine()
035    {
036        this.aParser = new Parser();
037        this.aDirectionHistory = new Stack<String>();
038        this.createRooms();
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Set up grahic user interface
043     * 
044     * @param pUserInterface User interface
045     */
046    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
047    {
048        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
049        this.printWelcome();
050    }
051    
052    /**
053     * Init all rooms we need to play the game
054     */
055    private void createRooms()
056    {
057        // Declare all the rooms
058        Room vComptoir = new Room("au comptoir de le boutique.", "images/room_comptoir.jpg");
059        Room vCaisse = new Room("à la caisse de la boutique.", "");
060        Room vMiroir = new Room("face au miroir.", "");
061        Room vEscalierRdC = new Room("dans les escaliers au rez-de-chaussé.", "");
062        Room vEscalierSousSol = new Room("dans les escaliers au sous sol.", "");
063        Room vEscalierEtage = new Room("dans les escaliers à l'étage.", "");
064        
065        Room vRayonPlanche = new Room("dans le rayon des plateaux de skateboard.", "images/room_planches.jpg");
066        Room vRayonRoulement = new Room("dans le rayon des roulements.", "images/room_roulements.jpg");
067        Room vRayonRoue = new Room("dans le rayon des roues.", "images/room_roues.jpg");
068        
069        Room vRayonCruiser = new Room("dans le rayon des cruisers.", "images/room_cruiser.jpg");
070        Room vRayonHoodie = new Room("dans le rayon des hoodies.", "images/room_hoodies.jpg");
071        Room vRayonChaussure = new Room("dans le rayon des chaussures.", "images/room_chaussures.jpg");
072        Room vRayonSac = new Room("dans le rayon des sacs.", "images/room_sacs.jpg");
073        
074        Room vMiniRampe = new Room("dans la mini-rampe.", "");
075        Room vPartieStreet = new Room("dans la partie street.", "");
076        
077        Room vReserver = new Room("dans la réserve.", "");
078        Room vToilettes= new Room("dans les toilettes.", "");
079
080        // Init exists for each rooms
081        vComptoir.setExit("south", vCaisse);
082        vComptoir.setExit("west", vRayonPlanche);
083        
084        vCaisse.setExit("north", vComptoir);
085        vCaisse.setExit("east", vRayonCruiser);
086        
087        vMiroir.setExit("south", vRayonHoodie);
088        vMiroir.setExit("east", vEscalierRdC);
089        vMiroir.setExit("west", vRayonChaussure);
090        
091        vEscalierRdC.setExit("south", vRayonRoue);
092        vEscalierRdC.setExit("west", vMiroir);
093        vEscalierRdC.setExit("up", vEscalierEtage);
094        vEscalierRdC.setExit("down", vEscalierSousSol);
095        
096        vRayonPlanche.setExit("east", vComptoir);
097        
098        vRayonRoulement.setExit("north", vRayonRoue);
099        vRayonRoulement.setExit("west", vRayonCruiser);
100        
101        vRayonRoue.setExit("north", vEscalierRdC);
102        vRayonRoue.setExit("south", vRayonRoulement);
103
104        vRayonCruiser.setExit("north", vRayonHoodie);
105        vRayonCruiser.setExit("east", vRayonRoulement);
106        vRayonCruiser.setExit("west", vCaisse);
107        
108        vRayonHoodie.setExit("north", vMiroir);
109        vRayonHoodie.setExit("south", vRayonCruiser);
110        
111        vRayonChaussure.setExit("east", vMiroir);
112        vRayonChaussure.setExit("west", vRayonSac);
113        
114        vRayonSac.setExit("east", vRayonChaussure);
115        
116        // Init Items positions
117        Item vItemPlanche_PlanB = new Item("Planche - Plan B", "Planche de skateboard, taille 8.25", 1.2, 65);
118        Item vItemPlanche_Girl = new Item("Planche - Girl", "Planche de skateboard, taille 8.25", 1.2, 55);
119        vRayonPlanche.addItem(vItemPlanche_PlanB);
120        vRayonPlanche.addItem(vItemPlanche_Girl);
121        
122        Item vItemRoulement = new Item("Roulement classique", "Roulement en acier ABEC5", 0.1, 20);
123        vRayonRoulement.addItem(vItemRoulement);
124        
125        Item vItemRoue = new Item("Roues classiques", "Roues SpitFire", 0.3, 35);
126        vRayonRoue.addItem(vItemRoue);
127        
128        // Init starting room
129        this.aCurrentRoom = vRayonCruiser;
130    } // createRooms
131    
132    /**
133     * Print location informations for the player
134     */
135    private void printLocationInfo(){
136        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription());
137        
138        if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null ){
139            this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
140        }
141    }
142    
143    /**
144     * Print welcome message for the player
145     */
146    private void printWelcome()
147    {
148        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
149        this.aGui.println( "Welcome to the World of Zuul!" );
150        this.aGui.println( "World of Zuul is a new, incredibly boring adventure game." );
151        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need help." );
152        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
153        this.aGui.println( this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription() );
154        if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null ){
155            this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
156        }
157    } // printWelcome
158    
159    /**
160     * Print help message for the player
161     */
162    private void printHelp()
163    {
164        this.aGui.println( "You are lost. You are alone. You wander" );
165        this.aGui.println( "around at Monash Uni, Peninsula Campus.\n" );
166        this.aGui.println( "Your command words are: " + this.aParser.getCommandString() );
167    } // printHelp
168    
169    
170    /**
171     * End the game
172     */
173    private void endGame()
174    {
175        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
176        this.aGui.enable( false );
177    }
178    
179    /**
180     * Navigate into a room
181     * 
182     * @param pCommand Command to navigate
183     * @param pToSave Save or not the navigation
184     */
185    private void goRoom(final Command pCommand, final boolean pToSave)
186    {
187        Room vNextRoom = null;
188        String vDirection = pCommand.getSecondWord();
189        
190        // Check if user input direction
191        if ( ! pCommand.hasSecondWord() ) {
192            this.aGui.println( "Go where?" );
193            return;
194        }
195        
196        // Navigate in specified direction
197        vNextRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit(vDirection.toLowerCase());
198        
199        if ( vNextRoom == null )
200            this.aGui.println( "There is no door!" );
201        else {
202            if(pToSave){
203                //Ajout de la Room à l'historique
204                this.aDirectionHistory.push(vDirection);
205            }
206            
207            this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
208            this.aGui.println( this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription() );
209            if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null )
210                this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
211        }
212    } // goRoom
213    
214    /**
215     * Return the opposite direction of the given direction
216     * 
217     * @param vDirection direction
218     * @return Opposite direction
219     */
220    private String getOppositeDirection(final String vDirection){
221        String vOppositeDirection;
222        
223        switch(vDirection){
224            case "north":
225                vOppositeDirection = "south";
226                break;
227            case "east":
228                vOppositeDirection = "west";
229                break;
230            case "south":
231                vOppositeDirection = "north";
232                break;
233            case "west":
234                vOppositeDirection = "east";
235                break;
236            case "up":
237                vOppositeDirection = "down";
238                break;
239            case "down":
240                vOppositeDirection = "up";
241                break;
242            default :
243                vOppositeDirection = "";
244                break;
245        }
246        
247        return vOppositeDirection;
248    }
249    
250    /**
251     * Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
252     * If this command ends the game, true is returned, otherwise false is
253     * returned.
254     * 
255     * @param pCommandLine Command to interpret
256     */
257    public void interpretCommand( final String pCommandLine ) 
258    {
259        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCommandLine );
260        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand( pCommandLine );
261
262        if ( vCommand.isUnknown() ) {
263            this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
264            return;
265        }
266
267        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
268        if ( vCommandWord.equals( "help" ) )
269            this.printHelp();
270        else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "go" ) )
271            this.goRoom( vCommand, true );
272        else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "back" ) ){
273            Command vGoOpposite = null;
274            
275            if(!this.aDirectionHistory.empty()){
276                String vPreviousDirection = this.aDirectionHistory.peek();
277            
278                String vOppositeDirection = this.getOppositeDirection(vPreviousDirection);
279            
280                vGoOpposite = new Command("go", vOppositeDirection);
281                
282                this.goRoom( vGoOpposite, false );
283                
284                this.aDirectionHistory.pop();
285            } else {
286                this.aGui.println( "Vous n'avez pas encore bouger." );
287            }
288            
289        } else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "quit" ) ) {
290            if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
291                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
292            else
293                this.endGame();
294        } else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "look" ) ) {
295            Item vRoomItem = this.aCurrentRoom.getItem(vCommand.getSecondWord());
296            
297            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
298                this.aGui.println( vRoomItem.getLongDescription() );
299            }
300        }
301    }
302}
